title: RRB Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 2569 Junior Engineer Posts
description: The Railway Recruitment Board (RRB) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 2569 Junior Engineer, Depot Material Superintendent, and Chemical Metallurgical Assistant Jobs. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Diploma, B.E./B. Tech in Mechanical, Electrical, Civil Engineering, and B.Sc can apply for the RRB Recruitment 2025. The interested applican...
